guide.introduction: It's fun to make and it will wow your friends.
guide.introduction_rendered: It's fun to make and it will wow your friends.
guide.summary: You will need a rear axle, AA battery, dc motor, wire and a plastic housing. You will connect the wires to the motor then you will connect the motor to the axle then  putt all of that in the casing and finally putt the other part of the wire on battery.
guide.title: Battery on wheels
